article_title: Rokita discusses Trump, Supreme Court during visit to Kokomo
article_text:
Kokomo, IN (46901)

Today

Cloudy skies. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High near 85F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph..

Tonight

Mainly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 68F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.
